attributes.action: Make dvla issue more driving test
attributes.additional_details: It is getting in the way of people's life's not being able to book a driving at all in some parts of England there needs to be a change soon as possible it's stopping people to have transport I.e for work, college, University this is simply unfair and people want to see a change.
attributes.background: I want you to make dvla issue at least 150000 more driving in at least 3 months. This is unfair as hundreds of thousands of people wait and wait to be able to take a test some people having to wait over year to even be able to book a test. This is getting in the way of people's lifes.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The number of test slots is based on the availability of examiners. 

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to fund an increase in examiners, if that's something you'd like to see happen.  Or you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576153
